data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Adygey. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adygey, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 440,000 citizens of Adygey, Russia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary: On average, 35 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Adygey, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Adygey, Russia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Adygey, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kurd, Kurmanji people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Adygey, Russia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 440,000 souls living in the state of Adygey with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Adygey, Russia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
